Package main.java

Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Bus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Network

    public class Bus
extends java.lang.Object
implements Network
    Bus Object

    Handles the functions of a Bus network like the interactions between routers

      • Bus

        public Bus​(int inputNodes,
           javax.swing.JDesktopPane inputDesktopPane,
           OuterJFrame inputOJFrame)
        Creates a Bus object
        Parameters:
        inputNodes - the number of nodes in the Bus network
        inputDesktopPane - the desktop object of the program, used to update certain windows on it when things happen
        inputOJFrame - the JOuterFrame that holds the desktop, used to update values that are used by the windows

      • generatePacket

        public void generatePacket​(double chance)
        Sometimes generates a packet with a random number of flits and with a random destination. Then inputs the packet to a random router
        Specified by:
        generatePacket in interface Network
        Parameters:
        chance - The chance that a packet will be created

                           int locX,
                           int locY,
                           int destX,
                           int destY)
        Creates a packet (which is an array of flits)
        Specified by:
        createPacket in interface Network
        Parameters:
        numberOfFlits - The number of flits that the packet will be made out of
        locX - The X location of the flit
        locY - The Y location of the flit
        destX - The X destination of the flit
        destY - The Y destination of the flit
        Returns:
        An array of flits
